title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 860.12 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 860.12 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part or the application thereof to
any person or circumstance is held invalid, such invalidity shall not affect
other provisions or applications of this Part which can be given effect without
the invalid provisions or applications, and to this end the provisions of this

Part are declared to be severable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
860.12

Adopted

New

York State Register September 25, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 39, eff. 9/25/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
